text: • [[b]] Insurgency [[/b]] boosts combat potential and spying capabilities.
• The amount of Insurgency is increase by your spying activities and winning battles.
• Insurgency is lost through many ways, losing battles, spies inside your faction.
• [[b]] Qiang Sway[[/b]] is a resource shared among the Qiang factions, that allows for usage in assignments.
